name: Shimano Dura-Ace/XTR CN-HG901 11 Speed Chain
description: A great bikes deserves a great chain. Dura-Ace and XTR-level components are Shimano's no-compromise products, and this replacement chain is no exception. Its light weight, low rolling resistance and improved durability makes this chain a smart option for serious road and trail riders.Inner and outer plates are shaped for optimal shifting and reduce chance of chain drops.Hollow pins helps reduce weight.SIL-TEC friction reduction treatment applied to pin link plates and roller link plates as well as rollers.HG-X11 chain is compatible with all Shimano 11-speed road and mountain drivetrains (105, Ultegra, Dura-Ace, SLX, XT, XTR).Includes 1 quick-link for easy installation.Compatible with 11-speed–equipped ebikes.
